li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: With the standard setting, the machine does not stop when Alarm (Warning) is triggered.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: However, it is possible for machine operation to stop when Alarm is triggered by changing the setting.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Eliminate the cause of the Alarm and reset it to restart the machine.
